questions.title: Content signing failed: No rules
questions.body:
I am following the [Chat tutorial](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:99:ZeroChat+tutorial) and when I am signing the `data/users/content.json` it says "Content signing failed: No rules".

I don't think I missed anything and the file is definitely there. Any ideas?

answers.body: Okay the problem was I copied a bit that I was supposed to add to the root `content.json` to the `data/users/content.json`.
